title: Is A News Anchor Lying To You? Know The Signs!
description:
News anchors lie all the time. It's like breathing to them. Here's how you can tell if you're being bamboozled.

For more than a quarter century, The Patriot Post has been the #1 defender of liberty online. A free subscription is your chance to fortify yourself against mainstream media spin and big tech censorship. Ditch the mainstream media. Subscribe today: www.patriotpost.us/bee!
